Description: Henry Schein, Inc. agreed to pay $1,140,260 for allegedly violating the Civil Monetary Penalties Law provisions applicable to physician self-referrals and kickbacks.
Agency: Health & Human Services Department Office of Inspector General

Description: Henry Schein Practice Solutions, Inc., the provider of leading office management software for dental practices, agreed to pay $250,000 to settle Federal Trade Commission charges it falsely advertised the level of encryption it provided to protect patient data.

Agency: Washington State Department of Labor & Industries
